commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv add-record
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv add-record --port
                                                 --priority
                                                 --record-set-name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 --target
                                                 --weight
                                                 --zone-name
examples:
az network private-dns record-set srv add-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -t webserver.mysite.com -r 8081 -p 10 -w 10

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv create
commands.summary: Create an empty SRV record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv create --name
                                             --resource-group
                                             --zone-name
                                             [--metadata]
                                             [--ttl]
examples: az network private-dns record-set srv create -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv delete
commands.summary: Delete an SRV record set and all associated records.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv delete [--ids]
                                             [--if-match]
                                             [--name]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
                                             [--yes]
                                             [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set srv delete -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv list
commands.summary: List all SRV record sets in a zone.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv list --resource-group
                                           --zone-name
                                           [--max-items]
                                           [--next-token]
examples: az network private-dns record-set srv list -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv remove-record
commands.summary: Remove an SRV record from its record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv remove-record --port
                                                    --priority
                                                    --record-set-name
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    --target
                                                    --weight
                                                    --zone-name
                                                    [--keep-empty-record-set]
examples:
az network private-dns record-set srv remove-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -t webserver.mysite.com -r 8081 -p 10 -w 10

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv show
commands.summary: Get the details of an SRV record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv show [--ids]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set srv show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set srv update
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set srv update [--add]
                                             [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--if-match]
                                             [--metadata]
                                             [--name]
                                             [--remove]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--set]
                                             [--subscription]
                                             [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set srv update -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet --metadata owner=WebTeam
